Description: Painted limestone shabti of Nefertiti with a braided lappet-wig, a plain collar and grooved feet.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Giovanni Battista Belzoni
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1995 Feb-May, Atlanta, Emory University, Reflections of Women in the New Kingdom 1998/9 Oct-Jun, South Carolina, The Charleston Museum, Queens & Commoners of the New Kingdom 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed
